question: Which Union Ministry launched ‘Development of Wind Parks/Wind-Solar Hybrid Park’?
option1: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
option3: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
option4: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers welfare
answer: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
explanation:
The Union Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) has proposed the scheme of ‘Development of Wind Parks/Wind-Solar Hybrid Park’.
The Ministry has also sought feedbacks for developing wind and wind-solar hybrid parks in the country. The scheme with proper infrastructure including evacuation facilities in place has been proposed, to speed up installation of wind power projects.
